name: Brawl Zombie
description:
Survival journey in zombie world

This time, survivals come to new zone to explore again. For helping more and more survivals survive, they have to go on the hook.
When more new weapons are found, they come across a large number of unprecedented treatens, such as coffin zombie, big mouth zombie and etc. Survivals only can use weapons in hand to profect from strikes of these strong zombie elites.

New enemies
A large number of unprecedented zombie elites and more zombie actions

New weapons
Have you ever tried to blow up zombies by bazooka?

New operation experience
More fluent operation feeling to show your skills in the doom of zombies
